document.full_text: brian boucher stopped 35 shots as the flyers' new starting goalie to help philadelphia grab a first-round playoff series lead with a 4-2 win over the host buffalo sabres on monday.
document.title: roundup: with boucher in goal, flyers win second straight
lines_and_colors: brian boucher stopped 35 shots as the flyers' new starting goalie to help philadelphia grab a first-round playoff series lead with a 4-2 win over the host buffalo sabres on monday.
